subject: Re: [junit] using XMLJUnitResultFormatter
msgSnippet: ... Yes, the class writes the report in endTestSuite which doesn t get called by JUnit but by Ant. If you use Ant s Formatters at test listeners you need to
messageBody:
On Sun, 17 Jul 2005, Yogesh Seth <yogesh.seth@...> wrote:

> I don't get anything in reports.xml. Am I missing something ?

Yes, the class writes the report in endTestSuite which doesn't get
called by JUnit but by Ant.

If you use Ant's Formatters at test listeners you need to perform the
things that Ant otherwise would do, i.e. you need to fire
startTestSuite and endTestSuite yourself.

Stefan
